12 BUTTONS

A simple button toolkit based on Beautons by Harry Roberts.

12.1 Base

Default styling for all types of button.

Click me 
<a href="#" class="btn {$modifiers}">Click me</a>

12.2 Dimensions

Default styling for all types of button.

Size Me Up
.btn--small

small size button

Size Me Up
.btn--large

large size button

Size Me Up
.btn--huge

huge size button

Size Me Up
.btn--full

will fill the entirety of their container.

Size Me Up 
<a href="#" class="btn {$modifiers}">Size Me Up</a>

12.3 Font Size

Styling for buttons representing specific actions states.

Take Action!
.btn--alpha

positive actions; e.g. sign in, purchase, submit, etc.

Take Action!
.btn--beta

negative actions; e.g. close account, delete photo, remove friend, etc.

Take Action!
.btn--gamma

negative actions; e.g. close account, delete photo, remove friend, etc.

Take Action! 
<a href="#" class="btn {$modifiers}">Take Action!</a>

12.4 Actions

Styling for buttons representing specific actions states.

Take Action!
.btn--positive

positive actions; e.g. sign in, purchase, submit, etc.

Take Action!
.btn--negative

negative actions; e.g. close account, delete photo, remove friend, etc.

Take Action! 
<a href="#" class="btn {$modifiers}">Take Action!</a>

12.5 Styles

Styling for buttons representing specific actions states.

Take Action!
.btn--soft

use an overly-large number to ensure completely rounded, pill-like ends

Take Action!
.btn--hard

remove rounded ends

Take Action! 
<a href="#" class="btn {$modifiers}">Take Action!</a>
Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
